document.full_text: forces loyal to muammar gaddafi stepped up their onslaught on rebel areas of libya's western mountains late on monday, rebels said, and refugees said towns in the isolated region were on the brink of starvation.
document.title: fighting rages in libya's western mountains
lines_and_colors: forces loyal to muammar gaddafi stepped up their onslaught on rebel areas of libya's western mountains late on monday, rebels said, and refugees said towns in the isolated region were on the brink of starvation.
